definition: stripes of a tiger/"tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141)
"right open box" radical (Kangxi radical 22), occurring in 区, 医, 匹 etc
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
to tease/to mock sb without offending/to banter
to torment/to abuse (an animal, child etc)

sentences.english: It's not a decision you'll regret, even if L.A. winds up losing in a blowout.
sentences.chinese: 即使快船被虐，你也不會後悔這個決定。

sentences.english: But on the plus side it was nice to see Yao abuse Bogut!
sentences.chinese: 但另一方面，能看到姚明虐博格特。

sentences.english: I have also prepared to go abuse a cat-lover friend that is even softer-hearted than I am.
sentences.chinese: 我還準備去虐我一個比我還心軟的愛貓朋友去。

sentences.english: Why did I even come to this thread. I knew this would be here.
sentences.chinese: 明知道會有人寫這個，我還進這個貼找虐幹嘛。

sentences.english: Saw once more while convenient your subject, you have been oppressive , closes our trifling thing?
sentences.chinese: 順便再次看到了你的主題，你被虐了，關我們屁事？

sentences.english: He must be a psycho taking delight in torturing others.
sentences.chinese: 他肯定是一個以虐囘待他人爲樂趣的變囘態。

sentences.english: Are they treating him well, or is he been starved and beaten?
sentences.chinese: 他們對他怎麼樣，抑或是他是否在捱餓，被虐打？
多麼病態又有被虐傾向的獅子啊。

definition: to hang sb up and beat him
to hover between life and death (idiom)/to suffer terribly/within an inch of one's life
lit. cuts and bruises all over (idiom); fig. totally refuted
(lit.) so exhausted (by difficulties in a relationship) that one feels one could never fall in love again (Internet slang)/disenchanted with sth
(coll.) presenting as unfriendly and blunt, but warm and tender inside (loanword from Japanese "tsundere")
(of a couple) to be sweet to each other/lovey-dovey/variant of 膩味|腻味[ni4 wei5]
to do the splits (gymnastics)/(Tw) two-timing (in romantic relationships)/Taiwan pr. [pi1 tui3]
